item.title: Downloads
item.description: Brick Downloads Brick consists of several TTL (“Turtle”) files. Latest version (v1.0.2) available here: Brick.ttl: Brick classes and tagsets BrickFrame.ttl: Brick relationships BrickTag.ttl: Brick tags (internal) BrickUse.ttl: Brick uses relationships (internal) Past releases are available on GitHub Brick Papers and Presentations BuildSys 2016 Paper BuildSys 2016 Presentation BuildSys 2016 Demo Abstract BuildSys 2016 Poster Brick Building Examples Example buildings represented in Brick: Gates Hillman Center Location: Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA, USA BMS: Automated Logic Controls Built: 2009 Size: 217,000 sq ft Number of points: 8,292 Tagsets mapped: 99% Number of Relationships: 35,693 Rice Hall Location: University of Virginia, Charlottesville, VA, USA Built: 2011 Size: 100,000 sq ft Number of points: 1,300 Tagsets mapped: 98.
